This can be used to check all styles of numbers by applying OpenType features including small numbers 

check zero with o and O and itsef. 
Zero should usually be looser than O or 0
Zero should usually be evenly spaced between o or O 


o0oo0o0o0o0o0o0o0o0o0o0
O0O0O0O0O0O0O0O0O0O0O0O
00000000000000000000000


Check numbers next to zero for basic spacing

000102030405060708090


Check if any number makes a strong diagonal stripe that is too light or too dark

123456789012345678
901234567890123456
789012345678901234
567890123456789012
345678901234567890
123456789012345678

Check left and right side spacing in all combinations

000 101 202 303 404 505 606 707 808 909 101    	
010 111 212 313 414 515 616 717 818 919 202
020 121 222 323 424 525 626 727 828 929 303   	
030 131 232 333 434 535 636 737 838 939 404 
040 141 242 343 444 545 646 747 848 949 505  	
050 151 252 353 454 555 656 757 858 959 606 
060 161 262 363 464 565 666 767 868 969 707  	
070 171 272 373 474 575 676 777 878 979 808 
080 181 282 383 484 585 686 787 888 989 909	
090 191 292 393 494 595 696 797 898 999 000
